# `r emo::ji("oil_drum")` Units {#units}

There are soo many units in aviation. I still have to find out why. `r emo::ji("person_shrugging")`

## Vertical distance

Vertical distances (like distance from ground) are usually expressed in meters or in feets. 

## Horizontal distance

Here we have nautical miles (abbreviated NM), kilometers and meters (usually for distances below 5km).

## Speed

Speed is usually measured in knots. Vertical speed is measured in feet per minute.

## Mass

Kilogram, pound (lb).

## Temperature

Degree Celsius, Fahrenheit, Kelvin.

## Air pressure

Hecto pascals (hPa), millibars, inches of mercury.
